title: Will BHP Billiton plc’s Rally Help Rio Tinto plc?
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 27, 2015, 12:10 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 20 mins Will BHP Billiton plc’s Rally Help Rio Tinto plc? By Owain Bennallack | Fool.co.uk – 40 minutes ago 2,277.00 +77.0000 
Shareholders in FTSE 100 mining behemoth BHP Billiton (LSE: BLT) received some rare good news this week, when the company reassured its shareholders about both its long-term prospects and the outlook for its outsized dividend. And that could be good news for Rio Tinto (LSE: RIO) owners, too. 
To find out the strategies to adopt if you want to become one of the growing number of surprise UK millionaires , read this FREE Motley Fool report: ' 7 Simple Steps For Seeking Serious Wealth ' while it remains available! 

Owain Bennallack owns shares in BHP Billiton. The Motley Fool UK owns no shares in any company mentioned in this article. We Fools don't all hold the same opinions, but we all believe that considering a diverse range of insights makes us better investors.
